title: October 1, 2010
content:
Todayâ€™s guest is Marian Green and she is the Co-Founder and Chairperson for the organization Truth About Gardasil.org,... <!--more--> an organizational website that brings to public attention the on-going adverse effects of the HPV vaccine and as a network for parents with children who have suffered from inoculation.
The organization also provides counseling support and information resources for parents wish to inquire about the vaccines before submitting their children to the needle.
Marian became involved in the Gardasil controversy after her 16 year old daughter Holly, a first class athlete with Olympic ambitions, almost died shortly after a single does shot of Gardasil.
